alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:16PM CDT until June 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwest and Central Coleman County in west central Texas... Southeastern Runnels County in west central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 715 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leaday, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Voss and Talpa around 725 PM CDT. Valera around 735 PM CDT. Coleman and Santa Anna around 750 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, Fisk, Echo and Hords Creek Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
